title: SMC_GroupGetContinuePosition (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_GroupGetContinuePosition
Reads the continue position from the
continueData
.
The continue position is the position, from where a
MC_GroupContinue
can be performed using the
continueData
.

rows.Name: Execute
rows.Comment: Reads the position on rising edge

rows.Name: Done
rows.Comment: The operation has been finished successfully

rows: Signals that an error has occurred within the function block
The position where the interrupted path can be continued.
The coordinate system in which the position has been stored.

The positions where the additional axes movement can be
continued.
The movemnet Id corresponding to the interrupt position
